CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Enforcement proceedings;Article 6-1 - Access to court);Violation of Article 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Protection of property (Article 1 para. 1 of Protocol No. 1 - Peaceful enjoyment of possessions)
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in LOC , GPE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant sustained injuries in a traffic accident caused by the vehicles owned by the PERSON and ORG , both ORG / socially - owned companies ( the debtors ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE ORG in GPE rendered CARDINAL separate judgments ordering the debtors to pay the applicant certain sums as compensation for the sustained damages .

CARDINAL . Due to the NORP failure to fulfil their obligations from these decisions , the applicant submitted enforcement requests . On DATE and DATE , respectively , ORG in GPE issued enforcement orders to that effect . The enforcement proceedings are still pending and the above decisions remain unenforced .
